mediator apprentice general: You secretly yearn for conflict solely to make use of your training.
You perk up at the sound of what seems to be an argument, only to discover It's just a playful spat.
Everything is so peaceful and magical. Sometimes you search for a purpose.
You remind a warrior that there's plenty of food to go around when they scold an apprentice for eating before feeding the Clan.
You soothe another apprentice as they sob over never being able to finish their training and earn their full name, shoving down the bitter reminder that you'll never do so either.
